attributes.action: Establish "Spitfire Day" as a National Holiday on 15th August to Commemorate the Battle of Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Fifteenth of August should ring aloud in the collective memories of anyone who is of British origin or descent, as it was on the Fifteenth day of August 1940 that Adolf Hitler unleashed his ‘Adlertag’, Eagle Day; the Airborne prelude to his invasion of Britain; and it was only at the conclusion of the “Battle of Britain” that Hitler turned his attention to Russia in the mistaken belief that the British Empire would shrivel on the vine of the Western shores of a Nazi-dominated Europe.
